sentences.en: A conspirator is not of the stuff to bear surprises.
sentences.cn: 谋反者是经不起惊吓的.

sentences.en: As befit a professional conspirator, he employed a baffling assortment of aliases.
sentences.cn: 为了让自己更像一位专业的密谋者, 胡志明使用了各式各样的化名.

sentences.en: Even more numerous are ads by people offering themselves up as the rented co - conspirator.
sentences.cn: 还有很多人为自己打广告,把自己作为共谋犯来推销.

sentences.en: For what evidence had he in reality that O'Brien was any kind of political conspirator?
sentences.cn: 他真的有什么证据可以确定奥勃良是个政治密谋家 呢 ?

sentences.en: I'm no hero, and a bad conspirator.
sentences.cn: 我不是英雄, 而且是个很不得力的同谋犯.

sentences.en: In 1977, convicted conspirator G. Gordon Liddy was released from prison after more than four years.
sentences.cn: 1977年, 在“水门事件”中被控有罪的G·戈登·利迪在度过了四年多的牢狱生活之后获释.

sentences.en: It is the face of a conspirator.
Julius Caesar was murdered by a group of conspirators famously headed by Marcus Junius Brutus.
sentences.cn: 尤利乌斯·凯撒被以人所共知的马库斯·朱尼厄斯·布鲁特斯为首脑的一伙谋反者谋杀了。

sentences.en: Kim tells Nina that Rick wasn't really conspirator in the kidnapping.
sentences.cn: 金姆告诉尼娜,里克并不能真正算是绑架的同谋.

sentences.en: Mother spoke like a happy conspirator as she jiggled riches above their heads.
sentences.cn: 母亲在孩子们的头上晃动着她的珍藏,就像孩子们的快乐的同谋者.

sentences.en: That conspirator was accused of conspiracy to murder.
sentences.cn: 那个同谋者被控参与谋杀.

sentences.en: They represented him as the chief conspirator.
Why would you want to become a conspirator when you are so young?
sentences.cn: 你怎么小小年纪就想当阴谋家 啊 ?

trans.tran_en: A conspirator is a person who joins a conspiracy
